important_notice_description_1: Please ensure that you send only one transaction per payment address you generate. Sending multiple transactions to the same payment address could lead to funds being lost. If you intend to make multiple payments, it is important to create a distinct payment address for each transaction.
important_notice_description_2: Cutoshi cannot accept responsibility for any funds lost as a result of multiple payments being sent to a single payment address. Please keep in mind the transaction fees while making payments, funds received for amounts different from the intended value will be marked as "Partially paid."
important_notice_description_3: The token balance in your account will correspond to the price applied at the moment payment was received. Please keep in mind that prices are time sensitive and subject to change.
important_notice_description_4: Please consult our detailed step-by-step instructions for guidance or you can contact us at: {{value}} for any technical concerns related to payments that have been sent.
important_notice_description_5: Once the payment has been successfully processed, the CUTO tokens will become visible on your dashboard. Please be aware that the distribution of tokens to your wallet will occur following the conclusion of the final presale stage.
